thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hillenbrand Says Co, Units Entered Into Syndicated L/G Facility Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hillenbrand Says Co, Units Entered Into Syndicated L/G Facility Agreement
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Hillenbrand Inc:
* HILLENBRAND SAYS ON MARCH 8, CO, UNITS ENTERED INTO A SYNDICATED L/G FACILITY AGREEMENT - SEC FILING
* HILLENBRAND INC - FACILITY AGREEMENT REPLACES EXISTING SYNDICATED L/G FACILITY AGREEMENT DATED AS OF JUNE 3, 2013
* HILLENBRAND-AGREEMENT ALLOWS CO, CERTAIN UNITS TO REQUEST ISSUE UP TO EUR 150 MILLION IN UNSECURED LETTERS OF CREDIT, BANK GUARANTEES/OTHER SURETY BONDS Source text: ( bit.ly/2IhP4ZM ) Further company coverage:
